divs: sighting detailsit was around 6:40 when i glanced out my window facing the south. to my left i saw a bright white\green light in the east and that was moving in my direction and i had a feeling about it; it just didn't seem like a typical plane. i noticed it stop getting closer for a few seconds, appearing to just hang in the sky just over the trees. it then abruptly yet so smoothly turned to the south and then again back to the west towards me. it looked very strange so i decided to take snap a picture of it and my jaw dropped!
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
